评论概述: Fairly Fragile, but I love them. On my second pair!
评论详情: I really LOVE these earrings... always get complements and they are lightweight. My main gripe is that the wire that goes through the ear is very fragile. You have to slightly (and gently) twist this wire to put them on and take them off. This causes tension on the wire and after a short period of time, it breaks. I am on my second backup pair, to replace the one, so now I have an extra for when another wire snaps off! There is another design flaw... the "mechanism" used to close these earrings is a hole in the bottom tubing that you find "by feel' and insert the thin wire into to secure. This hole is NOT drilled deep enough to keep the earring securely in place. It pops out constantly, especially in the era of mask-on/mask off life. If the makers happen to pass their eyes over this review, my wish would be to drill that hole just a bit deeper. That said, these are gorgeous earrings that I will probably continue to purchase (though slightly disposable) if the price remains reasonable.

评论概述: Beautiful earrings AND packaging! Great gift!
评论详情: Everything about this product and this company (Lane Woods) has impressed me.  I would give this as a gift anytime! The packaging is wonderful: an elegant gold-printed box containing a little white drawstring jewelry bag holding the earrings, each one protected by a tiny zip locked bag. Also inside the box was a lovely gift tag you can fill out with the person's name, etc. and a matching card printed with jewelry care tips.  If their products are made with the same attention to detail as the Lane Woods company gives their packaging, I can't imagine any complaints! I wouldn't hesitate to order Lane Woods jewelry again.
